comment: Rap music made it big when groups like NWA were what America feared, gangsters on drugs having promiscuous boatloads of sex and killing people. Kanye West just trolled the media by becoming the new version of what they fear, restoring the authenticity to his work as it is perceived by the audience. He's like a hip-hop political G.G. Allin now.
amr:
# ::snt Rap music made it big when groups like NWA were what America feared, gangsters on drugs having promiscuous boatloads of sex and killing people. Kanye West just trolled the media by becoming the new version of what they fear, restoring the authenticity to his work as it is perceived by the audience. He's like a hip-hop political G.G. Allin now.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / make-it-14
            :ARG0 (m3 / music
                  :mod (r / rap))
            :ARG1 (b / big)
            :time (f / fear-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "America"))
                  :ARG1 (g / group
                        :example (o / organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "NWA"))
                        :ARG1-of (m4 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (a / and
                                    :op1 (g2 / gangster
                                          :prep-on (d / drug)
                                          :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                                                :ARG1 (s / sex-01
                                                      :manner (p / promiscuous))))
                                    :op2 (k / kill-01
                                          :ARG0 g2
                                          :ARG1 (p2 / person))))))
            :snt2 (t / troll-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Kanye"
                              :op2 "West"))
                  :ARG1 (m5 / media)
                  :ARG2 (b2 / become-01
                        :ARG1 p3
                        :ARG2 (v / version
                              :ARG1-of (n4 / new-01)
                              :ARG1-of (f2 / fear-01
                                    :ARG0 (t2 / they)))
                        :manner (r2 / restore-02
                              :ARG0 p3
                              :ARG1 (a2 / authentic-02
                                    :ARG1 (w / work-01
                                          :ARG0 p3)
                                    :ARG1-of (p4 / perceive-01
                                          :ARG0 (a3 / audience)
                                          :ARG2 a2))))
                  :mod (j / just))
            :snt3 (r3 / resemble-01
                  :ARG1 (h2 / he)
                  :ARG2 (p5 / person
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "G.G."
                              :op2 "Allin")
                        :mod (p6 / political))
                  :time (n6 / now))))
